Event.name: Downing
Event.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> disables a flying or floating <fen>Patient</fen>, causing it to be unable to support itself in its current medium.
<ex>It's rumored that <fex name="Agent">she</fex> <t>downed</t> <fex name="Patient">a helicopter</fex> <fex name="ins">with a precisely fired arrow</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> forces the <fen>Patient</fen> to come to the ground.</def-root>

Arg.name: Patient
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Patient</fen> is the entity that is being forced to the ground.</def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive
Arg.definition: <def-root>Depictive phrase describing the actor of an action. </def-root>

Arg.name: Result
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Result</fen> of causing the <fen>Patient</fen> to come to the ground.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>An act performed by an <fen>Agent</fen> that enables them to force the <fen>Patient</fen> to the ground.</def-root >

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>Any description of the intentional act which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (<ment>quietly, loudly</ment>), and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>). In addition, it may indicate salient characteristics of an <fen>Agent</fen> that also affect the action (<ment>presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully</ment>). </def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>The time at which the event takes place.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>The location at which the event takes place.</def-root>

Arg.name: Cause
Arg.definition: <def-root>An event which causes the <fen>Patient</fen> to come to the ground.</def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition: <def-root>An object used by the <fen>Agent</fen> to facilitate bringing down the <fen>Patient</fen>.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: down.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: disable and cause to land or crash.

lexUnit.name: shoot down.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: shoot at an aircraft, forcing it to land or crash.

lexUnit.name: downing.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the act of causing a aerial vehicle to become disabled and land or crash.
